definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
a speech/to speak/to talk/to address/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
to hold a conversation/to talk over the telephone/phone call

sentences.english: Sends the encrypted session key to the server.
sentences.chinese: 將加密的會話密鑰發送給服務器。

sentences.english: When the article arrived, the editor read the first sentence and then refused to publish it.
sentences.chinese: 稿子寄來後，編輯看第一句話就拒絕予以發表。
你能給這句話消除歧義嗎。

sentences.english: One example is "One word weighs nine Dings".
sentences.chinese: 字面意思呢就是說一句話抵得上九隻鼎。

sentences.english: Then decline tone, she is a big mouth to fight over.
sentences.chinese: 話沒落音，她就是一個大嘴巴打過來。

sentences.english: But Jesus made no reply, not even to a single charge--to the great amazement of the governor.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌仍不回答，連一句話也不說，以致巡撫甚覺希奇。

sentences.english: In other words, u is a function of T and V.
Do some critical thinking and write your thesis statement down in one sentence.
sentences.chinese: 做一些批判性的思考，並用一句話陳述出你的論點。

sentences.english: On a rainy day, Mayor Bloomberg opened the show with these words.
sentences.chinese: 圈”，市長布隆伯格打開這些話的節目。

sentences.english: The audience ate up everything he said.
sentences.chinese: 聽衆們聆耳恭聽他所說的每一句話。

sentences.english: Who was it said that good could not come out of evil ?
sentences.chinese: 惡行生不出善果來，是誰講過這句話來着？

sentences.english: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌仍不回答，連一句話也不說，以致巡撫甚覺希奇。

sentences.english: Such was the coarse language of this bad, neglected boy.
sentences.chinese: 那個沒教養的壞孩子吉姆說起話來就是這麼粗俗。

sentences.english: Breeze Xin I say the time of this sentence, seem to be to have a little out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 風間欣吾說這句話的時候，顯得有點上氣不接下氣。

sentences.english: I had to go below ground to an office where I spoke to a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 我走到了地下的一間辦公室才和一個警察說上話。

sentences.english: AT seven-thirty Friday evening Scali passed this word along.
sentences.chinese: 星期五晚上七時半，斯卡利把話傳了過去。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
